scripts.upload: aws s3 cp main.bundle.js.gz s3://htmlpoll.kinecosystem.com/main.bundle.js --content-encoding gzip --acl public-read && aws s3 cp index.html s3://htmlpoll.kinecosystem.com/index.html --acl public-read
scripts.upload-playground: aws s3 cp main.bundle.js.gz s3://assets.kinplayground.com/web-offers/cards-based/main.bundle.js --content-encoding gzip --acl public-read && aws s3 cp index.html s3://assets.kinplayground.com/web-offers/cards-based/index.html --acl public-read
scripts.publish: npm run bundle && npm run upload
scripts.publish-playground: npm run bundle && npm run upload-playground
scripts.analyze: webpack --profile --json  --config webpack.prod.js > stats.tmp.json; webpack-bundle-analyzer stats.tmp.json && rm stats.tmp.json
